name: Firefoxtarfile
tagline: This is how to update firefox
body:
Tired of trying to update firefox in CyberPatriot?
Deleted Firefox and can't get it back?

This is the site for you!

Simply enter `git clone https://github.com/ronakdev/firefoxtarfile` and you'll be able to run the installer in no time!

`#`JustCyberPatriotThings
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
